name: U.nidentified F.lappy O.bject
description:
This is a game that I made within 24 hours back in October, as a sort of challenge to see how quickly I can actually make a half-ways decent game, because Ludum Dare 48 inflated my ego too much. 

To put simply, this is a Flappy Bird clone that I made (I couldn't think of any more simplistic games to rip off) because I got super bored one day, and it has been almost a whole year since I've put out a game
